title: Cant log in
body: I cant log-in. I was playing a game and it kicked me out of the game and client. Ever since, i cant log back in. It just says authenticating forever. Then eventually itll tell me "an unexpected error has occured"

replies.body: Sounds like your network is having a little trouble getting a solid signal with our login servers. We can adjust a couple settings like port forwarding and reconfigure your DNS to make sure you can get a strong signal by following the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Let me know if you're still having problems after following those steps.
I'm having this exact same error. I've tried on multiple accounts too. None of which will let me log in. I've even exited the client and restarted it.
